body:
Hi Mark,


There is no explicit setting for the lower limit, but you can use the  
-log option to falsecolor to specify a number of decades between the  
top and bottom of the range, and this number can be anything.  So, if  
you want a minimum that is 15 and a maximum of 2000, you would specify:


	-s 2000 -log 2.125


Since log10(2000) - log10(15) is 2.125.


Make sense?
-Greg
